attributes.action: Put the general election, second referendum and the EU elections on the same day
attributes.background: To save the British taxpayer time and money, and given the likelihood of all three needing to take place, put all three elections on the same day

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure whether you would like all of these three events to take place or whether you would them scheduled on the same day if they happen.

You could start a new petition calling for an EU membership referendum, general election and European elections to be held and to be held on the same day if that's what you would like to see happen.
